entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@DlaminiZuma 1 Million Graves is adequate for a population of 1,6 Billion at the UK Covid-19 death rate at present.
More Graves than Hospital Beds!
Are you planning on burying patients alive?
Perhaps Jacob Zuma did the Counting, or Bheki Cele in between counting Till Slips from smokers?
